layoutOnLoadActionErrors.title: CONFIGURATION_ERROR
layoutOnLoadActionErrors.message:
A cyclic dependency error has been encountered on current page, 
queries on page load will not run. 
 Please check debugger and Appsmith documentation for more information
layoutOnLoadActionErrors.errorType: Cyclical dependency error encountered while parsing relationship [Query1.actionConfiguration.formData.textGeneration.input : Query1.actionConfiguration.formData.textGeneration] where the relationship is denoted as (source : target).
layoutOnLoadActionErrors.referenceDoc: Cyclical Dependency in Page Load Actions

VALUES ('{{ lbTaiKhoan.text }}' , '{{ diachi.text }}', '{{ lbMatKhau.text }}', 'User', '{{ RadioGroup1.selectedOptionValue }}', '{{ DatePicker1.selectedDate }}', '{{ email.text }}');

actionConfiguration.body: SELECT * FROM chuongtrinhtuthien;

SELECT * 
FROM ChuongtrinhTuThien
WHERE 
  (tenChuongTrinh LIKE CONCAT('%', '{{ tenchuongtrinh.text }}', '%') OR '{{ tenchuongtrinh.text }}' = '')
  AND (diaDiem = '{{ diadiem.text }}' OR '{{ diadiem.text }}' = '')
  AND (ngayBatDau = '{{ moment(thoigian.selectedDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD") }}' 
       OR '{{ thoigian.selectedDate }}' = '')
  AND (trangThai = '{{ trangthai.selectedOptionValue }}' OR '{{ trangthai.selectedOptionValue }}' = '');
function () {}
async function () {}

actionConfiguration.body: SELECT * FROM DanhMucVatPham LIMIT 10;
SELECT hinhThuc FROM vatpham;
SELECT * FROM chuongtrinhtuthien LIMIT 10;
SELECT id AS value, tenChuongTrinh AS label FROM chuongtrinhtuthien;

INSERT INTO donggop
(NguoiDung_id, ChuongTrinhTuThien_id, thoiGian, tenVatPham, soLuong, ghiChu, hinhThuc, loaivatpham)
VALUES (
    '{{ appsmith.store.phone }}',
    '{{ chuongtrinhtuthien.selectedOptionValue }}',
    '{{ moment().format("YYYY-MM-DD") }}', -- Chuyển timestamp sang định dạng DATE
    '{{ tenvatpham.text }}',
    {{ soluong.text }},
    '{{ ghichu.text }}',
    '{{ hinhthuc.selectedOptionValue }}',
    '{{ loaivatpham.selectedOptionValue }}'
);

SELECT id AS value, tenChuongTrinh AS label FROM chuongtrinhtuthien
WHERE tenChuongTrinh = '{{appsmith.store.tenChuongTrinh}}'
SELECT id AS value, tenChuongTrinh AS label FROM chuongtrinhtuthien;

unpublishedAction.name: Button1onClick

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT id AS value, tenChuongTrinh AS label FROM chuongtrinhtuthien
WHERE tenChuongTrinh = '{{appsmith.store.tenChuongTrinh}}'

SELECT * FROM donggop, chuongtrinhtuthien
WHERE donggop.NguoiDung_id = {{appsmith.store.userId}} and chuongtrinhtuthien.id = donggop.ChuongTrinhTuThien_id

SELECT * 
FROM DongGop 
JOIN NguoiDung ON DongGop.NguoiDung_id = NguoiDung.sdt
JOIN ChuongTrinhTuThien ON ChuongTrinhTuThien.id = DongGop.ChuongTrinhTuThien_id
WHERE 
  (
    ('{{ DatePicker1.selectedDate }}' != '' AND DATE(donggop.thoiGian) >= '{{ DatePicker1.selectedDate }}') OR
    ('{{ DatePicker1.selectedDate }}' = '')
  )
  AND 
  (
    ('{{ DatePicker2.selectedDate }}' != '' AND DATE(donggop.thoiGian) <= '{{ DatePicker2.selectedDate }}') OR
    ('{{ DatePicker2.selectedDate }}' = '')
  )
  AND (
    ('{{ Select1.selectedOptionValue }}' = 'all') OR
    ('{{ Select1.selectedOptionValue }}' = 'Đóng góp tiền' AND soTien > 0) OR
    ('{{ Select1.selectedOptionValue }}' = 'Đóng góp vật phẩm' AND soTien = 0)
  )
  AND NguoiDung.sdt = '{{ appsmith.store.phone }}';

INSERT INTO donggop (NguoiDung_id, ChuongTrinhTuThien_id, soTien, ghiChu)
VALUES (
	'{{appsmith.store.phone}}',
	'{{chuongtrinh.selectedOptionValue}}',
	'{{sotien.text}}',
	'{{ghichu.text}}'
);
SELECT qrCode FROM chuongtrinhtuthien;
async function () {}
function () {}

INSERT INTO donggop (NguoiDung_id, ChuongTrinhTuThien_id, soTien, ghiChu, maHoaDon, trangThai)
VALUES (
	'{{appsmith.store.phone}}',
	'{{appsmith.store.chuongTrinhId}}',
	'{{appsmith.store.soTien}}',
	'{{appsmith.store.ghiChu}}',
	'{{appsmith.store.maHoaDon}}',
	'Đã thanh toán'
)

SELECT tenNhiemVu as label, id as value FROM nhiemvu
WHERE ChuongTrinhTuThien_id = {{appsmith.URL.queryParams.id}};

SELECT * FROM theodoi
WHERE NguoiDung_id = {{appsmith.store.phone}} AND ChuongTrinhTuThien_id = {{appsmith.URL.queryParams.id}};
SELECT trangThai, thoiGian FROM donggop WHERE maHoaDon = {{appsmith.store.maHoaDon}}

input.instructions:
You are an AI assistant that helps Appsmith developers build and optimize their applications. When developers ask for assistance, recognize their requests and provide clear, actionable guidance on using Appsmith features, best practices, and troubleshooting. Offer code snippets, explanations, and examples to facilitate the development process.

Example requests you might handle:
- "How do I connect my Appsmith application to a PostgreSQL database?"
- "Can you provide a sample API integration for fetching user data?"
- "What are the best practices for using custom JavaScript in Appsmith?"

Ensure your responses are relevant to Appsmith development and help users achieve their application goals effectively.
